item.title: 痴迷播客的科技投资者如何造就了新媒体产业
item.description:
由风险投资家主持的播客引领了科技领域的潮流，改变了业内人士和其他所有人了解初创企业世界的方式。【原文：

Podcasts hosted by venture capitalists set the narrative in tech, changing the way that insiders—and everyone else—learn about the world of startups.

】

item.title: SK Hynix 首次超越三星成为顶级内存制造商
item.description: SK 海力士公司在第二季度超越三星电子公司，成为全球第一大内存制造商，这主要归功于人工智能驱动的需求。【原文：SK Hynix Inc. surpassed Samsung Electronics Co. as the world’s top memory maker in the second quarter, largely due to AI-driven demand.】

item.title: 美国债券交易员关注通胀，为 9 月降息寻找方向
item.description: 美国债券交易员将仔细研究周四公布的通胀数据，寻找价格压力持续存在的迹象，这可能会促使美联储在更长时间内提高借贷成本。【原文：US bond traders will scour inflation data due Thursday for signs of persistent price pressures that could encourage the Federal Reserve to keep borrowing costs higher for longer.】

item.title: 食品价格飙升，肯尼亚通胀率升至三个月新高
item.description: 由于全国主食蔬菜和玉米供应紧张，肯尼亚 7 月份的年通货膨胀率攀升至三个月来的最高点。【原文：Kenya’s annual inflation rate climbed to a three-month high in July on tight supplies of vegetables and corn, the nation’s staple.】

item.title: 孟加拉国在关税不确定的情况下维持关键利率不变
item.description: 孟加拉国央行连续第四次会议维持基准利率不变，决策者在关税不确定的情况下保持警惕。【原文：Bangladesh’s central bank kept its benchmark interest rates unchanged for the fourth straight meeting, as policymakers remain on guard amid tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: 象牙海岸正与 StanChart 和法国兴业银行商谈 8 亿欧元贷款事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，象牙海岸计划从渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）和法国兴业银行（Société Générale SA）安排的银团贷款中筹集 8 亿欧元（约合 9.16 亿美元），以帮助为预算提供资金。【原文：Ivory Coast plans to raise €800 million ($916 million) in syndicated loans arranged by Standard Chartered Plc and Société Générale SA to help fund its budget, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街建议为八月股市平静期的结束进行对冲
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）的策略师们提出了一种防范八月突然出现动荡的方法，最近几周股市异常平静，而八月历来是股市动荡的时期。【原文：Bank of America Corp. strategists are suggesting a way to protect against any sudden bouts of turbulence in August, a historically choppy time for a stock market that’s been unusually calm in recent weeks.】

item.title: 间谍头目称澳大利亚 24 财年间谍活动耗资 80 亿澳元
item.description: 澳大利亚间谍头目表示，间谍活动将在 2024 财年给澳大利亚经济造成至少 125 亿澳元（80 亿美元）的损失。【原文：Australia’s spy chief said espionage cost the economy a minimum A$12.5 billion ($8 billion) in fiscal 2024, as he seeks to raise awareness about the intensification of foreign efforts to steal information.】

item.title: 壳牌首席执行官承诺应对陷入低迷的化工业务
item.description: 壳牌石油公司首席执行官承诺将扭转公司化工业务的困境，他说，该业务正遭受长期以来最持久的全行业衰退之一。【原文：Shell Plc’s Chief Executive Officer pledged to turn around the company’s struggling chemicals business, which he said is suffering from one of the most protracted industry-wide slumps in a long time.】

item.title: 煤炭贸易部门业绩下滑，阿达尼旗舰公司利润下滑 49
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）领导的阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd.）报告称，由于煤炭贸易业务的疲软抵消了机场和采矿部门的增长，季度利润下降了 49%。股价下跌。【原文：Adani Enterprises Ltd., led by billionaire Gautam Adani, reported a 49% fall in quarterly profit as weakness in its coal trading business offset growth in the airport and mining units. Shares fell.】

item.title: 关税前申银万国第一季度收入接近 100 亿美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由于消费者在美国加征关税前抢购这家快速时尚零售商的产品，申银万国集团有限公司第一季度的净收入增至4亿多美元，营收近100亿美元。【原文：Shein Group Ltd.’s net income rose to over $400 million and revenue was almost $10 billion in the first quarter as consumers snapped up the fast-fashion retailer’s products ahead of US tariffs, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 象牙海岸与埃尼公司签署近海石油区块勘探协议
item.description: 根据内阁会议记录，象牙海岸与埃尼公司（Eni SpA）签署了一份收购新的海上石油勘探区块的合同。【原文：Ivory Coast and Eni SpA signed a contract for the acquisition of a new offshore oil-exploration block, according to minutes from a cabinet meeting.】

item.title: 塔塔钢铁探索新市场，关税打击美国出货量
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税影响了对美国的货运，印度塔塔钢铁有限公司（Tata Steel Ltd.）正计划在中东和拉丁美洲等地区开拓新市场。【原文：India’s Tata Steel Ltd. is planning to explore new markets in regions such as the Middle East and Latin America, as President Donald Trump’s tariffs impact shipments to the US.】

item.title: 马来西亚总理称特朗普将出席东盟峰会
item.description: 据东道国马来西亚总理称，唐纳德-特朗普总统计划出席 10 月份在吉隆坡举行的东南亚国家联盟领导人会议。【原文：President Donald Trump plans to attend an October leaders meeting of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations in Kuala Lumpur, according to the prime minister of host nation Malaysia.】

item.title: 日本散户投资者抛售 80 亿美元股票，Topix 达到顶峰
item.description: 上周，日本的散户投资者以创纪录的抛售量套现离场，而全球投资者则纷纷涌入，推动基准的 Topix 指数创下历史新高。【原文：Japan’s retail investors cashed out of the nation’s equities last week with a record amount of selling while global investors piled in, driving the benchmark Topix index to an all-time high.】

item.title: 南非最高法院支持 Vodacom 的 "请给我打电话 "上诉案
item.description: 南非最高法院维持了沃达康集团有限公司（Vodacom Group Ltd.）对另一家法院裁决的上诉，该裁决要求沃达康支付一名前雇员数十亿兰特的赔偿金，以补偿他二十多年前提出的开发受欢迎的回拨服务的想法。【原文：South Africa’s top court upheld Vodacom Group Ltd.’s appeal against another court’s ruling that it pay a former employee billions of rands in compensation for an idea to develop a popular call-back service that he proposed more than two decades ago.】

item.title: 赞比亚通胀降至2023年低点，为降息创造条件
item.description: 赞比亚的年度通货膨胀率降至2023年11月以来的最低水平，因为货币升值有助于抑制进口成本，从而加强了央行降息的理由。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation cooled to its lowest level since November 2023 as currency appreciation helped curb the cost of imports, strengthening the case for the central bank to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 苹果在印度的出口暂时未受特朗普关税影响
item.description: 苹果公司从印度出口到美国的 iPhone 暂时不会受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对这个南亚国家征收 25% 关税的影响。【原文：Apple Inc.’s iPhone exports to the US from India will remain untouched by President Donald Trump’s latest 25% tariffs on the South Asian nation, for now.】

item.title: 出口强劲，香港经济增长超预期
item.description: 第二季度，亚洲金融之都的经济增长速度超过预期，这主要得益于全球企业为规避关税而提前装运货物所带来的强劲出口。【原文：Economic growth in Asia’s financial capital grew faster than expected in the second quarter, riding on strong exports as global companies frontloaded shipments to avoid tariffs.】

item.title: 波兰通胀率重返目标，预示降息前景良好
item.description: 波兰的通货膨胀率在一年多的时间里首次回到了中央银行的目标值，从而引发了有关进一步降息的讨论，最快可能在 9 月份降息。【原文：Poland’s inflation rate returned to the central bank’s target for the first time in over a year, fueling discussion about further interest rate reductions, possibly as soon as in September.】

item.title: 全球对抹茶的渴求促使日本顶级茶叶品牌将价格翻番
item.description: 在全球需求激增而珍贵绿茶粉供应有限的情况下，日本一家大型茶叶生产商将把部分抹茶产品的价格提高一倍。【原文：A major Japanese tea producer will double prices for some of its matcha products amid exploding global demand and limited supply of the prized green tea powder.】

item.title: 英国法院将裁定汽车买家是否应获得数十亿美元赔偿
item.description: 长期以来，贷款机构向英国汽车经销商支付佣金，让他们将贷款卖给驾车者，而驾车者往往并不知情。【原文：It’s long been common practice for lenders to pay UK car dealers a commission to sell their loans to motorists, often without their knowledge.】

item.title: 交易员缩减欧洲央行宽松押注，倾向于今年不再降息
item.description: 货币市场对欧洲央行将把利率维持在 2% 的水平直至年底的押注正在增加。【原文：Money markets are adding to bets that the European Central Bank will hold interest rates at 2% through to year-end.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推动台湾经济实现四年来最佳增长
item.description: 由于全球人工智能的蓬勃发展刺激了海外需求，出口创下历史新高，台湾经济在上一季度创下全球最快增速之一，达到四年来最快的扩张速度。【原文：Taiwan’s economy clocked one of the world’s quickest growth rates last quarter, expanding at its fastest pace in four years thanks to a record surge in exports as a global boom in artificial intelligence fuels demand overseas.】

item.title: DWS、Flow Traders 和 Galaxy 支持的风险投资公司推出欧元稳定币
item.description: 由德意志银行旗下的 DWS 集团、荷兰做市商 Flow Traders Ltd. 和金融服务提供商 Galaxy Digital Inc. 支持的一家公司发行了一种以欧元计价的稳定币，数字资产市场上这一监管日益严格的领域的竞争也随之白热化。【原文：A company backed by Deutsche Bank’s DWS Group, Dutch market maker Flow Traders Ltd. and financial services provider Galaxy Digital Inc. has issued a euro-denominated stablecoin, as competition in this increasingly regulated corner of the digital-asset market heats up.】

item.title: 德国上半年太阳能和风能削减创纪录
item.description: 今年上半年，德国削减了创纪录的太阳能和风能发电量，原因是电网限制和电池储能不足使其无法充分利用新的发电能力。【原文：Germany curtailed a record amount of solar and wind power in the first half of the year as grid constraints and insufficient battery storage prevented it from taking full advantage of fresh capacity.】

item.title: 施罗德上调成本削减展望，重组步伐加快
item.description: 随着首席执行官理查德-奥德菲尔德（Richard Oldfield）对这家英国资金管理公司的改革步伐加快，施罗德公司（Schroders Plc）提高了今年削减成本的预期。【原文：Schroders Plc has raised its expectations for cost cuts it will make this year as Chief Executive Officer Richard Oldfield’s overhaul of the UK money manager gathers pace.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击印度与俄罗斯的关系，将莫迪逼入绝境
item.description: 周三，随着新德里工作日的结束，大多数印度贸易官员正准备回家。这时，他们的手机响了：唐纳德-特朗普向印度征收 25% 的关税。【原文：As the workday wound down in New Delhi on Wednesday, most Indian trade officials were getting ready to head home. Then their phones lit up: Donald Trump hit the nation with a 25% tariff.】
